items.title: Filing: C3.ai plans to cut ~26% of its workforce; the company had ~1,200 employees as of April 2025; C3.ai shares drop 20%+ after hours on weaker FY guidance (Brody Ford/Bloomberg)
items.title_en: Filing: C3.ai plans to cut ~26% of its workforce; the company had ~1,200 employees as of April 2025; C3.ai shares drop 20%+ after hours on weaker FY guidance (Brody Ford/Bloomberg)
items.title_zh: 备案：C3.ai 计划裁员约 26%；截至 2025 年 4 月，该公司拥有约 1,200 名员工；由于财年指引疲弱，C3.ai 股价盘后下跌 20% 以上（布罗迪·福特/彭博社）

items.title: Blind refugee abandoned by Border Patrol is dead. Nurul Amin Shah Alam, a Rohingya refugee from Burma, was nearly blind and spoke no English. He was dropped off by agents in Buffalo on the other side of town from his home. His family was not notified of his release. Police are investigating
items.title_en: Blind refugee abandoned by Border Patrol is dead. Nurul Amin Shah Alam, a Rohingya refugee from Burma, was nearly blind and spoke no English. He was dropped off by agents in Buffalo on the other side of town from his home. His family was not notified of his release. Police are investigating
items.title_zh: 被边境巡逻队遗弃的盲人难民已经死亡。来自缅甸的罗辛亚难民努鲁·阿明·沙阿拉姆 (Nurul Amin Shah Alam) 几乎失明，也不会说英语。他被特工从他家送到了城市另一边的布法罗。他的家人没有收到他获释的通知。警方正在调查
